title: Mayor Byrne's Mile of Sculpture
marks: Signed, dated, chop mark LR: [Red Grooms \'82]
description: Overhead view of a long crowded pier that extends from a city in the background to a sea of boats in the foreground; the pier is adorned with sculptures of various shapes and sizes; predominant colors: red, yellow, blue, green, brown
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
